title.line_3:
From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we craft
unforgettable culinary experiences that bring people
 together and create lasting memories.

hero_section.description: We don't just serve food ‚Äî we create experiences. From the bustling concessions at your favorite stadium to the elegant spreads at VIP events, we craft culinary moments that bring people together.

intro_section.texte: We Are Eat Is Family! We create food experiences where people gather, celebrate, and connect. From kitchen operations to service delivery, our teams bring passion, precision, and genuine hospitality to every venue we support.

locations_section.description: From Paris to Marseille, we bring exceptional culinary experiences to the biggest venues in France. Discover our presence in your city.

services.title:
Feeding the Energy of 
Every Moment
services.description:
We operate food and beverage programs inside stadiums, arenas, and large-scale cultural events‚Äîmanaging everything from kitchen production to guest service. 

Our teams are trained for fast-paced environments where quality, timing, and atmosphere matter. Whether it‚Äôs matchday energy or festival crowds, we create experiences that feel human, organized, and memorable.

services.title:
Consulting Rooted in
Real World Expertisery Moment
services.description:
We  support venue operators through operational consulting‚Äîhelping optimize kitchen workflows, staffing structures, logistics, and service delivery. 

Our approach is grounded in real field expertise: the way teams communicate, how meals are prepared at scale, and how service truly runs when the pressure is high..

cta_section.title: Ready to Make an Impact?
cta_section.description: We deliver end to end catering experiences designed for every stage of your event ‚Äî before, during, and after. From pre event planning that includes technical diagnosis, resource strategy, logistics, setup, and branding, to on-site moments filled with vibrant service, entertainment, and cocktails, and finally post event disassembly, we handle every detail with precision and flair.

sustainable_service.title:
Reusable Service
Solutions at the core
sustainable_service.description: Implementing reusable containers and serviceware wherever possible to reduce single-use plastics.We minimize waste and source ingredients

sustainable_service.title:
Our Responsible Sourcing
and Waste Reduction
sustainable_service.description: We minimize waste and source ingredients responsibly to reduce environmental impact. We minimize waste and source ingredients responsibly to reduce environmental impact.

sustainable_service.title:
W√íe practise Eco
Conscious Packaging
sustainable_service.description: Biodegradable and compostable packaging options for all our service operations. We minimize waste and source ingredients responsibly to reduce environmental impact.

beautiful.title:
Beautiful Moments We‚Äôve
Helped Create
beautiful.text: We see every event as an opportunity to create memorable moments around the table.  We give your venue a unique setting with our food and drink stands ‚Äì where taste, freshness and conviviality come together to enhance the catering experience of your events.

cta_section.description: We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Discover and explore positions at other venues or submit a general application.

jobs.title: Head Chef At VIP Hospitality
jobs.description: Lead our VIP culinary team delivering exceptional fine dining experiences for luxury boxes and corporate hospitality suites during major sporting events and concerts.

jobs.title: Concession Sales Associate
jobs.description: Serve fans at concession stands, handle transactions, and provide friendly customer service at our stadium locations.

jobs.title: Event Coordinator
jobs.description: Coordinate logistics for large-scale events, managing vendors, schedules, and on-site troubleshooting.

jobs.title: Sous Chef
jobs.description: Assist the Head Chef in kitchen management, menu planning, and ensuring food quality standards are met.

sample_job.title: Head Chef At VIP Hospitality
sample_job.description: Lead our VIP culinary team delivering exceptional fine dining experiences for luxury boxes and corporate hospitality suites during major sporting events and concerts. Oversee family-friendly dining areas, create kid-friendly menus, and ensure welcoming atmosphere for all ages.
what_you_do: Lead daily operations and ensure quality standards
Collaborate with team members to deliver excellence
Contribute to menu planning and innovation
Train and mentor junior staff members
requirements: At least 5 years experience in high volume fine dining
Ability to manage teams of 10-15 chefs
why_join_us: Work at one of France's most iconic venues
Be part of major sporting and entertainment events
